DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacokinetic drug interactions between Rosuvastatin and Ezetimibe in Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.brief_title: Investigating the Pharmacokinetic Drug Interactions Between Rosuvastatin and Ezetimibe
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer, age 19~45 years The result of Body Mass Index(BMI) is not less than 19 kg/m2 , no more than 28 kg/m2 Subject who has the ability to comprehend the study objectives, contents and the property of the study drug before participating in the trial. Presence of medical history or a concurrent disease that may interfere with treatment and safety assessment or completion of this clinical study History of relevant drug allergies or clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction.
